Dynamic Contract Layers
-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=

PyDCL is an implementation of design by contract for Python based on context-oriented programming. It provides high flexibility in defining contracts with a grouping mechanism, thread-local scoping of contract checks, and run-time activation.

This package also includes ContextPy (Version 1.2).

Please check the example scripts and test cases for API usage.
